name: Shareable Assets
description: We built an end-to-end service that automatically generates custom graphics when artists reach milestones and prompts them to share.
descriptionShort: Empowering artists to share with fans

name: AMP Profile Enhancements
description: Added key features and usability updates to artist profile tools on AMP, resulting in a 303% increase in engagement and 68% increase in profile shares.

name: Resell
description: Designed an app to facilitate thrifting and selling on Cornell's campus. Worked with engineers to get from research to beta testing in two semesters.
descriptionShort: Facilitating thrifting and selling on Cornell's campus

name: Exceed
description: Designed an on-the-go solution for professionals to continue learning skills. Winner in a design case competition hosted by Paravane Ventures.
descriptionShort: Enabling professionals to continue learning skills on the go
